name: Where's Tumor (Trijam102)
description:
Where's Tumor ?

Some tumor cells are navigating through the blood cells of your patient. Problem : It's a very rare kind of tumor which looks like blood cells. Fortunately, it exist a contrast agent able to reveal all the tumor making  them more Wally than ever.

Find all the tumor cells and kill them to earn the maximum of medical points you can. Maybe, you will heal them.

How to play :

  • Right-click to reveal the tumors
  • Left-click to destroy cells
  • Destroying tumors to gain points
  • Every other mouse interactions, make you lose points

Made with Unity & gimp : https://github.com/ChristopheClaustre/Trijam102

Made for Trijam102. Theme: Contrast.

Made in 4h30.

Credits

  • Code and graphics by me.
